songs.story: During a pre-dodgeball meal at MarinaGrille off Route 70 in Brick, KMJ became the 3rd person to find out. Once the check was paid, the car radio played 'Say' with its perfect chorus. 'I said exactly what I needed to say; now I look back with a smile.'
